Question
========

Petra is interested in the relationship between the degree of perceived stress and number of cigarettes smoked per day in a population of smoking pregnant women. She suspects that coping also plays a role in this. In women with better coping skills, stress has a less strong influence on the number of cigarettes they smoke. What type of multivariate relationship is involved here? 
Answerlist
----------
* Spurious relationship
* Multiple causes
* Suppressor effect
* Interaction

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
